article_title: Bill Maher: Hey, Doesn't it Seem Like Democrats Have Lurched Far to the Left on Amnesty?
article_text:
If we have a blanket policy of not deporting non-criminal adults, isn't that an invitation to immigrate illegally? https://t.co/1ShrRfBV15

The Democratic candidates are closing in on the position that it is immoral to deport anyone who came here illegally who is not a criminal.

article_metadata.author: Guy Benson
